net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.widget.factory

Interface UiSingleWidgetButtonFactory<HANDLER extends UiHandlerAction>

  • Type Parameters:
    HANDLER - is the generic type of the handler interface. E.g. UiHandlerActionSave.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiSingleWidgetButtonFactory, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryApply, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryApprove, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryCancel, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryClose, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryConfirm, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryDelete, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryDown, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryNext, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryOpen, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryPrevious, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryRemove, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactorySave, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryStartEdit, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryStopEdit, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactorySubmit, UiSingleWidgetButtonFactoryUp

    public interface UiSingleWidgetButtonFactory<HANDLER extends UiHandlerAction>
    This is the interface for a factory used to create a UiWidgetButton for a particular UiHandlerAction.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UiWidgetButton create(UiContext context, HANDLER handler, boolean preventConfirmationPopup) 
      Class<HANDLER> getHandlerInterface() 
      boolean isInstance(UiHandlerAction handler)
      Determines if the given handler is an instance of the managed handler interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getHandlerInterface

        Class<HANDLER> getHandlerInterface()
        Returns:
        the UiHandlerAction sub-interface managed by this factory.

      • isInstance

        boolean isInstance(UiHandlerAction handler)
        Determines if the given handler is an instance of the managed handler interface. Needs to be implemented explicitly in order to be GWT compatible.
        Parameters:
        handler - is the handler instance to check.
        Returns:
        true if the given handler is an instance of the managed handler interface.

      • create

        UiWidgetButton create(UiContext context,
                      HANDLER handler,
                      boolean preventConfirmationPopup)
        Parameters:
        context - is the instance of UiContext.
        handler - is the instance of the UiHandlerAction.
        preventConfirmationPopup - - see UiWidgetFactory.createButton(Class, UiHandlerAction, boolean)
        Returns:
        the new UiWidgetButton.
        See Also:
        UiWidgetFactory.createButton(Class, UiHandlerAction, boolean)
